metadata.title: CVE-2024-38381 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfc: nci: Fix uninit-value in nci_rx_worksyzbot reported the following uninit-value access issue [1]nci_rx_work() parses received packet from ndev->rx_q. It should bevalidated header size, payload size and total packet size beforeprocessing the packet. If an invalid packet is detected, it should besilently discarded.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
